_comment: Benchmark scenarios for FT tasks. Used by run_ft_job.sh and UI.

aime24.description: Improve performance on AIME 2024 math competition problems

aime25.description: Improve performance on AIME 2025 math competition problems

panorama.description: Improve patent examination capabilities including prior art retrieval, paragraph identification, and novelty/obviousness assessment based on USPTO Office Action documents

panorama_par4pc.description: Improve prior art retrieval for patent claims: given a patent claim, retrieve the most relevant prior art patents from a candidate pool that could be used to reject the claim

panorama_pi4pc.description: Improve paragraph identification for patents: given a patent claim and a cited prior art patent, identify the specific paragraphs in the prior art that are most relevant to evaluating the claim

panorama_noc4pc.description: Improve novelty and obviousness classification for patent claims: determine whether a claim lacks novelty (anticipation) or is obvious based on the cited prior art paragraphs

panorama_par4pc_cot.description: Improve prior art retrieval with step-by-step reasoning: retrieve relevant prior art patents while providing detailed rationale for why each patent is relevant to the claim

panorama_pi4pc_cot.description: Improve paragraph identification with chain-of-thought: identify relevant prior art paragraphs while explaining the technical connections between the claim elements and cited content

panorama_noc4pc_cot.description: Improve novelty/obviousness classification with detailed reasoning: assess patentability while providing examiner-style rationale explaining how prior art anticipates or renders obvious the claim

chemcotbench.description: Improve chemistry reasoning across molecule understanding, editing, optimization, and reaction prediction tasks using chain-of-thought reasoning on SMILES structures

chemcotbench_mol_und.description: Improve molecule understanding: identify functional groups, ring systems, and structural features from SMILES representations with step-by-step structural analysis

chemcotbench_mol_edit.description: Improve molecule editing: perform precise substructure addition, deletion, or substitution operations on SMILES while maintaining chemical validity

chemcotbench_mol_opt.description: Improve molecule optimization: modify molecular structures to achieve desired properties (solubility, binding affinity, etc.) through systematic structural modifications

chemcotbench_reaction.description: Improve chemical reaction prediction: predict reaction products, mechanisms, and conditions with detailed reasoning about bond breaking/forming and electron flow

tablebench_data_analysis.description: Improve table-based data analysis: impact analysis, correlation analysis, trend forecasting, and statistical analysis on tabular data

tablebench_fact_checking.description: Improve fact verification against table data: validate statements by cross-referencing with tabular information

tablebench_numerical_reasoning.description: Improve numerical reasoning on tables: arithmetic operations, aggregations, and comparative analysis

tablebench_visualization.description: Improve chart generation from tables: create bar charts, line charts, pie charts, and scatter plots based on tabular data

tablebench_gen.description: Improve overall table question answering across all task categories (fact checking, numerical reasoning, data analysis, visualization)

FinanceIQ_ppl.description: Improve financial question answering capabilities including accounting, auditing, economics, finance, insurance, securities, and tax domains
